item.title: Ethereum Price Technical Analysis - ETH Approaching Support - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Ethereum Price Technical Analysis - ETH Approaching Support - NEWSBTC

Ethereum price looks like setting up for a minor correction towards a major support area of $13.20 where it may find buyers. Ethereum price looks like setting up for a minor correction towards a major support area of $13.20 where it may find buyers.

item.title: Ex-S&P Capital IQ data executive joins BNC as Head of Business Development
item.description:
Ex-S&P Capital IQ data executive joins BNC as Head of Business Development

Data and Information Executive Rory Manchee, has joined Melbourne-based blockchain technology vendor BNC. The new Head of Business Development is responsible for planning and executing its Digital Assets Market-Data, business and product development efforts.

item.title: How can blockchain be used for art works?
item.description:
How can blockchain be used for art works?

The US presidential podium, or "The Blue Goose" has always been an iconic part of each presidency. A fun fact is that a special agent is given the job of attaching the presidential seal to the podium every time the president speaks from it. Why?

item.title: How would one go about making a social network using blockchain?
item.description:
How would one go about making a social network using blockchain?

Answer: This is an impossible question to answer. Short answer is you don't. Long answer is any number of the concepts around blockchain could be used is the making of a social network. Just a login system is part of Facebook but just a part. Have you more context to share?

item.title: "Blockchain" or Bitcoin: Understanding the differences
item.description:
"Blockchain" or Bitcoin: Understanding the differences

In this talk, Andreas explores the rise of the term "blockchain" as a counterweight to bitcoin. The term blockchain does not provide a definition, as it has been diluted to be meaningless. Saying "blockchain" simply invites questions, such as "what is the consensus algorithm". Meanwhile, bitcoin continues to offer an alternative to the traditional financial system.

item.title: Bitcoin available over the counter at a newsagency near you
item.description:
Bitcoin available over the counter at a newsagency near you

Two Australian tech start-ups are launching an over-the-counter platform for selling Bitcoin making it available to everyday consumers and providing online retailers and the newsagents offering the service more streams for income. It means Australians will be able to buy Bitcoin over the counter with cash for the first time.

item.title: ID2020: How Blockchain Could Be Used To Solve Global Identity Crisis
item.description:
ID2020: How Blockchain Could Be Used To Solve Global Identity Crisis

ConsenSys, Microsoft, and Blockstack Labs collaborate to create an open-source, self-sovereign, blockchain-based identity system while ex-trader starts a non-profit ID2020 to address the problem at UN-level, through public-private partnership. According to the United Nations, there are around 1.5bn people across the world who have no way of proving who they are.
